title: 93/232/EEC: Commission Decision of 31 March 1993 approving the Greek programme of agricultural income aid
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 31 March 1993 approving the Greek programme of agricultural income aid
(93/232/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme of agricultural income aid for farmers in Greece notified to the Commission by the Greek authorities on 2 March 1993 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to all the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 March 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 84, 29. 3. 1989, p. 8.
(2) OJ No L 371, 20. 12. 1989, p. 17.
(3) OJ No L 110, 1. 5. 1991, p. 72.
